value:
Are these clothes a bit much?
Commander Anna was in charge of
the Day of Devotion preparations...

Nothing is more precious or more
enduring than bonds of fellowship.
Many Heroes have taught me that.

I can feel the joy of the citizenry
celebrating the Day of Devotion.
That is the joy I want to defend.

Do you have a festival like the Day
of Devotion in your world too? You
must tell me all about it sometime.

Princess Veronica is attending the
festival as well... I hope there can be
peace between us, if just for now.

Would you care to come join the Day
of Devotion festivities happening over
at $Nf's castle?

I care about you, from the bottom of
my heart. I hope you feel the same.

I must be distracted by all these
thoughts of love...
Rather embarrassing...

Thank you. This must be yet another
way you show your affection.

The Day of Devotion is upon us!
I hope to express my love in a fashion
I can call my own.

The Day of Devotion festival was
a success again this year!$k$pThe people gathered here speak
with joy and love in their voices.$k$pSomeday I, too, hope to have
someone at my side to celebrate
the Day of Devotion with...$k$pBut for now, my priority is bringing
peace to Askr and protecting the
lives of its people...$k$pThose hopes consume my every
thought and desire.$k$pUntil then, I will fight as hard as I can
so that Askr can continue celebrating
the Day of Devotion.
たあっ
For you
うっ…
Not bad...
Understand me now?
With humility...
Will you accept this?
I hope you like it!
Heartbreaking...
sigh...
Happy Day of Devotion! Let's enjoy ourselves today.
What? Oh! But...today isn't a good day for horseplay.
This festival brought my mother and father together. Nothing could make me happier.
I'd like to give gifts to all the Heroes helping the Order, but...well...
I am so excited to get presents... Did anybody notice that? Anybody?
One mistake and I might have ended up just like Líf...
This is for you. To me, you are just as important as family.
As you say.
Hmm.
A gift!
